statements: SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE movie_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456';
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE title LIKE '%batman%';
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT movie_id, title FROM movies WHERE director = 'Quentin Tarantino';
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE title LIKE '%Godfather%';
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE director = 'Steven Spielberg' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT director_name FROM directors ORDER BY director_name DESC;
SELECT id, director_name FROM directors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT movie_title FROM movies WHERE director_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE movie_title LIKE '%Action%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM directors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT director_name FROM directors ORDER BY director_name DESC;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN directors ON movies.director_id = directors.id;
SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM directors JOIN movies ON directors.id = movies.director_id GROUP BY director_name;
SELECT director_name, movie_title FROM directors JOIN movies ON directors.id = movies.director_id WHERE director_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY director_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM movies;
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies WHERE director_name = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies ORDER BY movie_name DESC;
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies WHERE director_name = 'Steven Spielberg' AND director_name = 'Martin Scorsese';
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies WHERE director_name IN ('Quentin Tarantino', 'Christopher Nolan');
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies WHERE movie_id = 1;
SELECT director_name, movie_name FROM movies WHERE director_name = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT * FROM directors WHERE director_id = 2;
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies WHERE director_name LIKE '%Tarantino%';
SELECT movie_name, director_name FROM movies ORDER BY director_name ASC, movie_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT director_name, director_id FROM directors ORDER BY director_name DESC;
SELECT director_name FROM directors WHERE director_id = 1;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN directors ON movies.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT movie_title, genre_name FROM movies JOIN movie_genre ON movies.movie_id = movie_genre.movie_id JOIN genre ON movie_genre.genre_id = genre.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) as movie_count FROM directors JOIN movies ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id GROUP BY directors.director_name;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN directors ON movies.director_id = directors.director_id ORDER BY movie_title DESC;

SELECT movie_title, genre_name FROM movies JOIN movie_genre ON movies.movie_id = movie_genre.movie_id JOIN genre ON movie_genre.genre_id = genre.genre_id WHERE genre_name = 'Action' ORDER BY movie_title ASC;
SELECT director_name, COUNT(*) as movie_count FROM directors JOIN movies ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id GROUP BY directors.director_name HAVING movie_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT director_name FROM directors WHERE director_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT movie_title, year_released FROM movies WHERE year_released > 2000 ORDER BY year_released DESC;

SELECT director_name, genre_name FROM directors JOIN movies ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id JOIN movie_genres ON movies.movie_id = movie_genres.movie_id JOIN genres ON movie_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT movie_title, rating FROM movies JOIN ratings ON movies.movie_id = ratings.movie_id WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM directors;
SELECT movie_title, director_name FROM movies JOIN directors ON movies.director_id = directors.director_id;
SELECT movie_title, genre_name FROM movies JOIN movie_genres ON movies.movie_id = movie_genres.movie_id JOIN genres ON movie_genres.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT director_name, COUNT(movie_id) AS movie_count FROM directors LEFT JOIN movies ON directors.director_id = movies.director_id GROUP BY director_name;
SELECT movie_title, year_released, rating FROM movies LEFT JOIN ratings ON movies.movie_id = ratings.movie_id;
